LanguageData.BasicGravtech.description: Refine chemfuel into astrofuel and store it in pressurized tanks. Unlocks the construction of the gravjumper engine, allowing the first steps into gravship travel.
LanguageData.OrbitalTech.description: Build vac barriers to protect against depressurization, and orbital scanners to detect locations in space.
LanguageData.StandardGravtech.description: Unlock gravship engines capable of lifting a colony into orbit. Allows construction of control terminals for new gravship systems such as gravtech research and maintenance.
LanguageData.AdvancedGravtech.description: Unlock gravhulks, massive gravships capable of supporting entire colonies. Also allows crafting of gravlite panels, essential ultratech material for advanced gravship construction.
